title: Dragon Ball Z
para: Dragon Ball Z is a legendary anime that follows Goku and his friends as they defend Earth from powerful foes. The series is known for its intense battles, energy blasts, and transformations like Super Saiyan.

title: Monkey D. Luffy
para: Monkey D. Luffy is the fearless captain of the Straw Hat Pirates, aiming to become the King of the Pirates. He gained rubber powers after eating the Gum-Gum Fruit. The series is known for its action-packed adventures, pirates, and epic battles.

title: Death Note
para: Death Note is a psychological thriller anime about a genius student, Light Yagami, who finds a notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it. He uses it to try to create a crime-free world.

title: Haikyuu!!
para: Haikyuu!! is a sports anime that follows Shoyo Hinata, a short but passionate volleyball player with big dreams. He joins Karasuno High and aims to become one of the best.

title: Hunter x Hunter
para: Hunter x Hunter follows Gon Freecss, a boy who becomes a Hunter to find his long-lost father. Along the way, he forms strong bonds with friends like Killua, Kurapika, and Leorio.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
para: Jujutsu Kaisen follows Yuji Itadori, a high schooler who becomes a Jujutsu Sorcerer after swallowing a powerful cursed object — Sukuna’s finger. He joins Tokyo Jujutsu High to fight curses and protect humanity.

title: The Promised Neverland
para: The Promised Neverland tells the story of Emma, Norman, and Ray—kids living in an orphanage who uncover a dark secret about their fate. They plan a daring escape to save themselves and the other children.

title: Dragon Ball Z
para: Dragon Ball Z is a legendary anime that follows Goku and his friends as they defend Earth from powerful foes. The series is known for its intense battles, energy blasts, and transformations like Super Saiyan.

title: Vinland Saga
para: Vinland Saga follows Thorfinn, a young warrior seeking revenge against the man who killed his father. Set in the Viking era, it blends history with intense action and deep emotion.

title: Tokyo Revengers
para: Tokyo Revengers follows Takemichi, a young man who travels back in time to save his ex-girlfriend and change the future. He gets involved with the Tokyo Manji Gang to rewrite fate.

title: Demon Slayer
para: Demon Slayer follows Tanjiro Kamado, a kind-hearted boy who becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister Nezuko is turned into a demon. He vows to find a cure and defeat the demons plaguing the world.

title: Dandadan
para: Dandadan is a wild and fast-paced manga that blends the supernatural with sci-fi, following Momo and Okarun as they battle aliens and ghosts. It starts when their beliefs clash—she believes in ghosts, he believes in aliens.

title: Haikyuu!!
para: Haikyuu!! is a sports anime that follows Shoyo Hinata, a short but passionate volleyball player with big dreams. He joins Karasuno High and aims to become one of the best.

title: Say I Love You
para: Say I Love You is a romantic anime that follows Mei Tachibana, a quiet girl who has never had friends or a boyfriend. Her life changes when she meets Yamato Kurosawa, a popular and kind-hearted boy.

title: Attack on Titan
para: Attack on Titan is a dark, action-packed anime where humanity fights for survival against giant humanoid creatures called Titans. Eren Yeager, along with Mikasa and Armin, vows to destroy them after tragedy strikes his home.

title: Hello World
para: Hello World is a sci-fi romance anime film set in a futuristic Kyoto, where a high school boy named Naomi meets his future self. Together, they try to save a girl named Ruri from a tragic fate.

title: High School DxD
para: High School DxD follows Issei Hyoudou, a high school student who is killed by a fallen angel and revived by Rias Gremory, a powerful demon. He becomes a devil and joins her household, diving into a world of supernatural battles.

title: My Dress-Up Darling
para: My Dress-Up Darling follows Wakana Gojo, a shy boy who loves making traditional dolls, and Marin Kitagawa, a lively girl passionate about cosplay. Their worlds collide when Marin asks Gojo to help her create costumes.

title: Rent-A-Girlfriend
para: Rent-A-Girlfriend follows Kazuya Kinoshita, a college student who rents a girlfriend, Chizuru Mizuhara, after a painful breakup. Things get complicated when their fake relationship starts to mix with real emotions.

title: Sakamoto
para: Sakamoto is a cool, stylish high school student who handles every situation with perfection and grace. No matter the challenge, he always finds a smooth and clever way out.

title: Solo Leveling
para: Solo Leveling follows Sung Jin-Woo, the weakest hunter in a world where humans fight monsters in deadly dungeons. After a mysterious event, he gains the power to level up on his own.

title: Spy x Family
para: Spy x Family follows Loid Forger, a spy who must create a fake family to complete a secret mission. He unknowingly adopts a telepathic girl, Anya, and marries an assassin, Yor.

title: Tokyo Revengers
para: Tokyo Revengers follows Takemichi, a young man who travels back in time to save his ex-girlfriend and change the future. He gets involved with the Tokyo Manji Gang to rewrite fate.

title: Tsuritama
para: Tsuritama is a colorful and quirky anime about Yuki, a shy boy who moves to a seaside town and learns to fish with some unusual new friends—one of whom claims to be an alien. Together, they form a bond that unexpectedly leads to saving the world.

title: Your Name
para: Your Name is a romantic fantasy anime film about two teenagers, Taki and Mitsuha, who mysteriously begin swapping bodies. As they live each other’s lives, a deep connection forms between them.
